pageContext.claim: “We'll make a real deal, not that horrible short-term deal that was made by the Obama administration.”
pageContext.analysis: The Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action, as the Iran nuclear deal is formally known, actually bars Iran from ever seeking, developing or acquiring nuclear weapons. Trump is alluding to the argument that some restrictions in the deal sunset over time and that Iran could pursue a nuclear weapons program in secret once those restrictions are gone.
